entries.title: Intel’s next-gen Meteor Lake CPUs could be amazing for laptops
entries.description: Meteor Lake rumor suggests way more powerful thin-and-light laptops are inbound.

entries.title: Businesses are wasting millions on unused software licenses
entries.description: Cut back on your business outgoings by re-visiting unused software licenses, and reap the rewards, experts say.

entries.title: Google Chrome browser gets Nvidia RTX GPU tech that could revolutionize Netflix viewing
entries.description: New feature looks to boost the quality of everything you watch with DLSS-style upscaling to 4K.

entries.title: Top background check services hit by data breach
entries.description: Identity data on millions of TruthFinder and Instant Checkmate users stolen and placed on an underground hacking forum.

entries.title: Leaked DJI Mini 2 SE could soon be the best cheap drone for beginners
entries.description: Leaked photos of a DJI Mini 2 SE drone suggest the new entry-level drone is ready to fly in from bargain-ville.

entries.title: Widespread cyberattack hits servers across Europe
entries.description: A two-year-old flaw is being leveraged semi-automated in ransomware attacks, experts claim.

entries.title: More signs that OLED iPad and MacBooks are coming, as mini-LED set to nosedive
entries.description: New reports concerning the future of mini-LED demand corroborate existing OLED iPad and MacBook rumors.

entries.title: Disney Plus may follow HBO Max's lead and sell content to its rivals
entries.description: Disney Plus' back catalog might be streamlined amid financial losses, according to a new report.

entries.title: Microsoft Excel could be next to get an AI boost
entries.description: With ChatGPT rolling out to some Microsoft software, the company is now designing its own AI assistants.

entries.title: The Oculus Quest 3 will get one of the Meta Quest Pro's exclusive features
entries.description: The Oculus Quest 3 will have the Meta Quest Pro's full-color Meta Reality (mixed reality) capabilities when it launches.

entries.title: Apple thinks you'll pay even more for an iPhone – setting the scene for an Ultra?
entries.description: Comments from Apple suggest we might see an iPhone Ultra, but it might not land until next year.

entries.title: Windows 365 updates could soon be a lot less disruptive
entries.description: Get the latest Windows 365 updates without disrupting your work.

entries.title: Tips for boosting your organization’s security posture with encryption
entries.description: Keep your business safe with these top tips.
